description:
Ohatsu was the daughter of Nagamasa Azai and Oyu, sister to Yodo and the niece of Nobunaga Oda.
Since the birth of Hideyori to her older sister, Ohatsu has been very troubled by the change she has noticed in the two. Friends since childhood, Ohatsu holds intense feelings for Hideyasu. She is an expert marksman, with techniques similar to her mentor, Magoichi Saiga. Ohatsu uses a wide variety of firearms as well as explosives and a grapple hook.
name: Ohatsu
